comments.comment: We do not know whether Gota will become a brutal dictator if he is elected. It is up to the people to decide that. However what Dharmasiri says here about Hitler cannot be believed. At the time Hitler contested elections the democratic Weimar Republic was ruling Germany. Until Hitler‚Äôs party won the election in 1933 he had no power to use firearms to kill his opponents. He did not dare to do so and repeat the mistake he made earlier trying to overthrow the government violently and end up in jail.  He hardly talked about democracy but only made use of the system to come to power in a legitimate way. It was only after he assumed full dictatorial powers that he started suppressing his critics and opponents by jailing or killing them.  I have thoroughly studied both the Hitler period and the Second World War but I have never heard or read about the incident Dharmasiri is referring to.
comments.author: Janaka Perera
